creator: JoelMelo
title: ARDUINO HOME ELECTRICITY METERING
materials_required: Hall effect sensor (for older electricity meters)
Light sensor (for modern electronic electricity meters)
description: This project describes how to transform your home into a smart home by implementing energy (electricity, gas and water) metering in order to display consumption information.
steps: Identify the type of electricity meter in your home. It can be either an older model with a rotating disk or a modern electronic one.
If you have an older meter, you'll need a hall effect sensor to measure the magnetic field induced by the rotating magnets.
If you have a modern electronic meter, you'll need a light sensor to detect when the LED blinks.
